turns.speaker: A
turns.en: Hi Kevin, have you started working on the monthly report?
turns.zh: 嗨 Kevin，你開始做月報了嗎？

turns.speaker: B
turns.en: Yes, I’ve gathered most of the sales data. I still need the marketing numbers, though.
turns.zh: 有，我已經收集了大部分銷售數據。不過我還需要行銷部的數據。

turns.speaker: A
turns.en: I can follow up with the marketing team. Do you want me to request it by email?
turns.zh: 我可以去催一下行銷部。你要我用 email 要求嗎？

turns.speaker: B
turns.en: That would be great. Please ask for the figures from August 1st to 31st.
turns.zh: 那太好了。請幫我要 8 月 1 號到 31 號的數據。

turns.speaker: A
turns.en: Got it. Also, do you need help with the charts or formatting?
turns.zh: 了解。另外，你需要我幫忙做圖表或排版嗎？

turns.speaker: B
turns.en: Actually, yes. If you could handle the formatting, I can focus on the summary section.
turns.zh: 其實可以。如果你能處理排版，我就可以專心寫總結部分。

turns.speaker: A
turns.en: No problem. What’s our deadline again?
turns.zh: 沒問題。請問我們的截止日是什麼時候？

turns.speaker: B
turns.en: The report is due by next Wednesday, so we still have a few days.
turns.zh: 報告下週三前要交，我們還有幾天。

turns.speaker: A
turns.en: Perfect. Let’s check in again on Monday to review the progress.
turns.zh: 太好了。那我們星期一再確認進度吧。

turns.speaker: B
turns.en: Sounds good. Thanks for your help, Nina.
